meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Emeric Schultz Pat Gravitt Paul Curry Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1057.

td.p: Emeric Schultz, a chemistry professor from Bloomsburg, Pennsylvania
Pat Gravitt, a project manager originally from San Diego, California
Paul Curry, a training consultant from Laguna Hills, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $24,101)

tr.td: SEE THE USA
SHAKESPEARE
LYRICS
CELEBRITY MARRIAGES
ANCIENT EGYPT
"T" TIME
